title: Sollitaley Ava Kaadhala Lyrics Kumki Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: K.G.Ranjith & Shreya Ghoshal
Song: Sollitaley Ava Kaadhal
Movie: Kumki
Music: D Imman		 Other Songs Lyrics
Soi Soi Soi SoiA lady with violin (ayayyayyo female)Ayayayoo AananthameyOnnum PuriyalaNee eppo pullaSollitaaley Ava KaadhalaYella Oorum
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Sollitaale ava kaadhala
sollum podhey sugam thaalala.
Idhu pol oru vaarthaiya
yaaridamum nenju kekkala.
Ini veroru vaarthaiya
ketidavum enni paakala.
Ava sonna solle podhum
athukkeede illai yedhum..yedhum..

Sollitene iva kaadhala
sollum podhey sugam thaalala.
Ithu pol oru vaarthaiya
yaaridamum solla thonala.
Ini veroru vaarthaiya
pesidavum ennam koodala
Unthanbe onrae podhum
adhukkeedae illai yedhum..yedhum..

Ammaiaval sonna sol kekkala
appanavan sonna sol kekkala
unnodaya solla kettaen
rendu pera onnaa paarthaen

Manasayum thorandhu sonnaa
ellaamae kidaikudhu ulagathula
varuvatha eduthu sonnaa
santhosam mulaikuthu idhayathula

Ada sonna solle pothum
athukkeede illai yedhum..yedhum..

Sollitene iva kaadhala..
Sollitale ava kaadhala..

Ethanayo sollu sollamale
ullathile undu enbaargale
sollurathil paathi inbam
sonna pinne yedhu thunbam

Uthatula irundhu sonnaa
thannaala maranthidum nimisathula
Idhayathil irundhu sonnaa
pogama nilachidum uthirathula

Ava sonna sollae podhum
athukkeede illai yedhum..yedhum..

Sollitene iva kaadhala
sollum podhey sugam thaalala.
Ithu pol oru vaarthaiya
yaaridamum solla thonala.
Ini veroru vaarthaiya
pesidavum ennam koodala
Unthanbe onrae podhum
adhukkeedae illai yedhum..yedhum..		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
she told her love
couldn’t bear the happiness while she said.
heart didnt ask for this word
from any other women.
couldn’t think to hear any other
word than this.
the word she told is enough
nothing can equal it..

i told my love
couldn’t bear the happiness while telling.
could not think of telling this
to anyone else.
now, no thought to speak
any other word
your love is enough
nothing can equal it..

didn’t listen to mother’s word
didn’t listen to father’s word
i listened your word
and saw we both together.

if we tell from heart
we get all things in this world.
if we explain that comes,
happiness sprouts in heart.

the word she told is enough
nothing can equal it..

i told my love
she told her love..

people say many unspoken
words will be in mind.
Half happiness while telling, and
no suffering after telling.

if words just come from mouth,
it is forgotten in minute.
if words are said from heart,
it will stay in blood forever.

the word she told is enough
nothing can equal it..

i told my love
couldn’t bear the happiness while telling.
could not think of telling this
to anyone else.
now, no thought to speak
any other word
your love is enough
nothing can equal it..
